      • handleMessages

        @MessageMapping(value="/chat/{roomId}")
public Message handleMessages(@DestinationVariable(value="roomId")
                                                                      java.lang.String roomId,
                                                                      @Payload
                                                                      Message message,
                                                                      Traveler traveler)
                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Receive and send messages via websockets.

        Note: public and private chats work the same way. The permission handling is done at the SUBSCRIBE event as part of the AuthenticationInterceptor.

        Parameters:
        roomId - String
        message - Message
        traveler - Traveler
        Returns:
        Message
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
